subject: Re: [EVP-ITC] Re: My box is here and set up
author: Lisby
full_text:
Well, I just ran another and nada. I can hear all the radio fragments  
just fine however, how matter how I tune it. Anyway, I'm going to  
give it a rest for awhile and try again later.

Ann

On Dec 19, 2007, at 8:29 AM, LC Duplatt wrote:

>
> Ann, you are not alone.
>
> I have felt the same at times, but don't give up.  I found that  
> many times I am trying too hard to hear.  You must remain patient  
> and allow time for the spirit(s) to come through after turning the  
> device on.  In other words, let it sweep a bit.
>
> When they did come through for me, I began hearing word bits and  
> then getting replies to questions.  It is almost like it changes to  
> the trained ear, when it is manipulated.  You may try making  
> recordings at first and then playing them back a few times.  You  
> might find you have been missing someone talking to you - happened  
> to me.
>
> Hope this helps...just my take on things.
>
> LC
> http://www.AngelsGhosts.com
>
>
> --- In EVP-ITC@yahoogroups.com, Lisby <lisby@...> wrote:
> >
> > I ran a session last night for the first time, but got nothing.  
> There
> > are a lot of radio stations in this area (Baltimore-Washington)  
> and I
> > just could not get a tuning that gave me any confidence that what I
> > heard wasn't broadcast fragments--and really, nothing came through
> > that made me even wonder if.... Anyway, I went bed last night
> > thinking that I'm going to prove the exception to the rule and this
> > won't work for me, but I'm gonna give it a go again today.
> >
> > Any of you tech guys around today if I need some help with setting
> > and other tech issues?
> >
> > Ann
> >
>
>
>
